document.heading: Metropolitan Police Department Commencement of Discipline and Command Staff Appointment Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-173, the “Metropolitan Police Department Commencement of Discipline and Command Staff Appointment Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-810. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 28, 2014, and Nov. 18, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 8, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-499 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-173 became effective on Mar. 7, 2015.
